name: ListAppTargetsForAdminRole
description:
Retrieve OIN app targets for a specified APP_ADMIN role.

This tool is used to list all OIN app targets for an APP_ADMIN role assigned to a client, identified by clientId. It is useful for managing and reviewing application targets associated with specific administrative roles.

parameters.name: client_application_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the client application. Use this ID to specify which client's APP_ADMIN role targets to list.

parameters.name: role_assignment_id
parameters.description: The ID of the role assignment to identify the specific role assignment for the client.

parameters.name: pagination_cursor
parameters.description: The cursor for pagination, an opaque string from the `Link` response header.

value_schema.description: The cursor to use for pagination. It is an opaque string that specifies your current location in the list and is obtained from the `Link` response header. See [Pagination](https://developer.okta.com/docs/api/#pagination).

parameters.name: max_results_limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of objects to return in the response.

value_schema.description: A limit on the number of objects to return
